synopsis.text:
Champion ing the art of Gunpla building, Haru Irei embarks on an exhilarating journey after a chance encounter with the 1/1 scale RX-78-2 Gundam in Shizuoka Park. Inspired, Haru acquires the rare and unique GPB-X80 Beginning Gundam kit and dives headfirst into the thrilling virtual world of Gunpla Battle. In this competitive realm, players engage in adrenaline-pumping matches using their customized Gunpla models, striving to achieve the coveted rank of Gunpla Meister.

Joined by his enthusiastic school friend, Rina Noyama, and the experienced mentor, Kenta Sakazaki, Haru's passion for Gunpla building flourishes. Together, they navigate the challenges of Gunpla Battle, with Haru relying on his friends' unwavering support and camaraderie. As Haru hones his skills and learns the intricacies of Gunpla building and battling, he sets his sights on becoming a formidable Gunpla Battle Champion.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
